verses.roman:
se saba ślokera artha, se saba 'vikāra'
se saba varṇite grantha haya ati-vistāra

synonyms: se saba—all those; ślokera—of verses; artha—meanings; se—those; saba—all; vikāra—transformations; se saba—all of them; varṇite—to describe; grantha haya—the book becomes; ati-vistāra—very, very large.
translation: To explain fully all those verses and all the transformations that took place in the Lord's body would require a very large volume.
